situationi.st :rob safar

Understanding Media: The Extensions of Memes

07 Dec 2013 - by Rob Safar

This was (and could still be) an ongoing podcast that explores what was once going to be the subject of a dissertation of mine - combining the philosophies of McLuhan and Dawkins to develop and explore an evolutionary theory of remediation.

  • Visit extensionsofmemes.com to read more about the podcast; or
  • Subscribe to the podcast via RSS (though you might be waiting a while before it’s picked up again)
  • Subscribe via iTunes

If you liked this post, you can share it on Twitter or share it on Google+ or whatever.
